title: 1.21 Deuteronomy I: Moses Farewells His people
itunes:title: Deuteronomy I: Moses Farewells His people
description: Deuteronomy is the last book of the Torah, the Pentateuch, the books holiest to Jews. To many Jewish scholars, the Torah is where study of the bible stops. I discuss how Deuteronomy was modeled on Assyrian vassal treaties.
content:encoded: Deuteronomy is the last book of the Torah, the Pentateuch, the books holiest to Jews. To many Jewish scholars, the Torah is where study of the bible stops. I discuss how Deuteronomy was modeled on Assyrian vassal treaties.
itunes:subtitle: In three great speeches modelled on Assyrian treaties, Moses completes his law code.
